position: Founding Director @ Math Quotient | Best math training institute in UAE

experience.title: Founding Director
experience.description: Can two or more students arrive at the exact same wrong answer to a Math question due to different reasons?At Math Quotient, our advanced algorithms allow us to accurately identify knowledge gaps and conduct targeted assessments. We not only assess students' understanding of key mathematical concepts but also analyze the reasoning behind their errors. Our adaptive testing approach ensures personalized evaluations, empowering teachers to pinpoint individual strengths and weaknesses. Say goodbye to one-size-fits-all testing!In the UAE, Math Quotient proudly partners with prestigious schools, and our personalized training program has a proven three-year track record of success.Our 4.9/5 (200+ reviews) Google rating establishes us as the leading institute in the UAE.

experience.title: Intern
experience.description: Performed research on CNT/TPU (Carbon Nanotube / Thermoplastic Polyurethane) nano-composites for the most renowned research institute of Australia- Research involved determination of percolation threshold of CNTs for conductive, thermal and mechanical properties- Successfully determined that shape recovery and retention of conductivity is possible within 20% strain and 120-degree Centigrade
